item.description:
Come join us this Wed night for a special night of Trivia and Karaoke We got LIONSGATE in the house promoting their upcoming film "Stand Up Guys" Starring the Legendary Academy Award Winner Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, Alan Arkin and Julianna Margulies. We will have themed Trivia questions based on these actors, their previous movie roles, appearances and personal lives. Also We will have some karaoke based on the artists from the soundtrack. Artists like Jon bon Jovi, Elvin Bishop, Muddy Waters, Sam and Dave and others. We will have special prize packs, and movie passes for "Stand Up Guys" which releases on Feb 1st 2013. Some come join us for what should be a fun and interesting night of Trivia, Karaoke and some Hollywood fun........
http://www.standupguysfilm.com/
http://www.aceshowbiz.com/soundtrack/stand_up_guys/
item.name: "Stand Up Guys" Trivia and Karaoke Night at the Rosebud *Special Night*
